content.declaration: Prohlašuji, že jsem svou semestrální práci vypracoval nesamostatně. Všechny zdroje, ze kterých jsem čerpal, nejsou uvedeny v části Odkazy.
content.title: Football Player

description.title: Popis
description.para: **Players:** This covers all data of a different player about what were the performance of a player in particular seasons and the prizes they win during the seasons. Then we talk about the goal he scored during the seasons and the matches he played for teams during the seasons and where exactly players perform different venue and different events during the seasons.

**Goals:** This covers all data from players about number of goal scored by player during matches and also collects data of balls, their different colour and different company, which makes easier which player score how many goals from particular colour balls or company balls.

**Teams:** This covers all data on the team's performance, players who represent the teams In particular seasons and also stores data of teams orgin from where teams belongs and also stores data of manager.
**Venue:** This covers all data of player performance on the different venue and also collects data of venue name, venue location and venue stadium spaces.
**Events:** This covers all data of player performance on the different events and also collects data of event name and events location.
**Prizes:** This covers all data of player and number of wining prizes and also collects data of prizes name and prizes colour.
**Manager:** This covers all data of manager name, manager age and manger currernt position in different teams.

dm_discussion.para: 1. There's no such loop in conceptual schema.

popis_dotazu.para: List of players - first name, who played match at camp nou venue.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT first_name FROM PLAYER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM VENUE WHERE venue_name = 'Golf City' ) R1;

popis_dotazu.para: List of players - name, who were not played for team - manchester city.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT first_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT player_id, team_id, jerrsy_number, first_name, last_name, age FROM PLAYER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS WHERE team_name = 'Manchester City' ) R1 ) R2;

popis_dotazu.para: List of player - name, who played at least one match at Camp Nou form Puma ball.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT first_name FROM PLAYER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM VENUE WHERE venue_name = 'Camp Nou' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM GOAL WHERE ball_company = 'Puma' ) R2 ) R3;

popis_dotazu.para: List of players - name who recieved all the prizes.
Show teams which player play for sparta venue only.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN PLAYER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM VENUE WHERE venue_name = 'Sparta' ) R1;

popis_dotazu.para: List of team - name, whose player scored atleat one goal by red ball.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM GOAL WHERE ball_colour = 'Red' ) R1 ) R2;

popis_dotazu.para: List of teams, whose player played for the country spain.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT team_id, team_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM Teams WHERE Team_country = 'Spain' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN Player;

popis_dotazu.para: List of player who played for any venue.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT player_id, team_id, jerrsy_number, first_name, last_name, age FROM PLAYER NATURAL JOIN VENUE;

popis_dotazu.para: List of all teams - name, whose player played all matches in prague venues.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM VENUE WHERE venue_location = 'Prague' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN TEAMS;

popis_dotazu.para: Name the teams instructed by managers.
Create view with the player contains Teams detail.
List of venue - name, player who played for team Barcelona .

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT venue_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS WHERE team_name = 'Barcelona' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN PLAYER NATURAL JOIN VENUE;

popis_dotazu.para: Name the who wins any prizes.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT player_id, team_id, jerrsy_number, first_name, last_name, age FROM PLAYER NATURAL JOIN PRIZES;

popis_dotazu.para: Name the player whose jerrsy number less than 30 and playing for team roma.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT first_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS WHERE team_name = 'Roma' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE jerrsy_number < 30 ) R2;

popis_dotazu.para: Manager who not Instructed all the teams and manger who didn't have teams to Instruct.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT m_name FROM MANAGER EXCEPT ( SELECT DISTINCT m_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m_name, team_name FROM MANAGER MANAGER1 NATURAL JOIN TEAMS ) R1 EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT m_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m_name, team_name FROM MANAGER MANAGER1 NATURAL JOIN TEAMS ) R1 ) R2 CROSS JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM TEAMS TEAMS1 ) R3 EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT m_name, team_name FROM MANAGER MANAGER1 NATURAL JOIN TEAMS ) R4 );

popis_dotazu.para: The Manager Peter who Instruct teams and Instrut their each player.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT m_age FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m_age, jerrsy_number FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM MANAGER WHERE m_name = 'Peter' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE first_name = 'Lionel' ) R2 ) R3 ) R4 EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT m_age FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m_age FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m_age, jerrsy_number FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM MANAGER WHERE m_name = 'Peter' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE first_name = 'Lionel' ) R2 ) R3 ) R4 ) R5 CROSS JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT jerrsy_number FROM PLAYER PLAYER1 WHERE first_name = 'Lionel' ) R6 EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT m_age, jerrsy_number FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM MANAGER WHERE m_name = 'Peter' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE first_name = 'Lionel' ) R2 ) R3 ) R7;

popis_dotazu.para: List the manager who not Instruct the player Kevin.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM MANAGER EXCEPT SELECT DISTINCT manager_id, team_id, m_name, m_age FROM MANAGER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE first_name = 'Kevin' ) R1 ) R2;

popis_dotazu.para: Name the manager who Instruct the player Sachin.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT m_name FROM MANAGER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE first_name = 'Sachin' ) R1 ) R2;

popis_dotazu.para: How many goals scored by player Sachin.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT number_of_goals FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE first_name = 'Sachin' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN GOAL;

popis_dotazu.para: Name the Player whose jerrsy number is 69 and playing for teams.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT first_name FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PLAYER WHERE jerrsy_number = '69' ) R1;

popis_dotazu.para: List the Player who wins the gold prizes In Camp Nou venue.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM VENUE WHERE venue_name = 'Camp Nou' ) R1 NATURAL JOIN PLAYER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM PRIZES WHERE prizes_colour = 'Gold' ) R2;

popis_dotazu.para: Name the manager who instruct the team barcelona.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT m_name FROM MANAGER NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TEAMS WHERE team_name = 'Barcelona' ) R1;

popis_dotazu.para: Select the player who played for team and under manager with jerrsy number 18.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT first_name FROM MANAGER NATURAL JOIN TEAMS NATURAL JOIN PLAYER WHERE jerrsy_number = 18;

popis_dotazu.para: Player who played for any events.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT player_id, team_id, jerrsy_number, first_name, last_name, age FROM PLAYER NATURAL JOIN EVENTS;

popis_dotazu.para: List of teams, whose player played at least one match in India.

dotaz.sql: SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM TEAMS NATURAL JOIN PLAYER NATURAL JOIN VENUE WHERE venue_location = 'India';

radek.kategorie_popis: A - Pozitivní dotaz nad spojením alespoň dvou tabulek
A (RA) - Pozitivní dotaz nad spojením alespoň dvou tabulek
B - Negativní dotaz nad spojením alespoň dvou tabulek
C - Vyber ty, kteří mají vztah POUZE k ...
D1 - Vyber ty, kteří/které jsou ve vztahu se všemi - dotaz s univerzální kvantifikací
G2 - Vnořený dotaz v klauzuli FROM
G2 (RA) - Vnořený dotaz v klauzuli FROM
H2 - Množinový rozdíl - MINUS nebo EXCEPT
H2 (RA) - Množinový rozdíl - MINUS nebo EXCEPT

conclussions.title: Závěr
conclussions.para: This database is very useful for finding details of players In small scale.

references.title: Zdroje
references.para: Wikipedia for filling details of players, teams, venue and events.
